SEARCH
Package com.wileyedge.fashiontrendanalysis.service

Class CategoryServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.wileyedge.fashiontrendanalysis.service.CategoryServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CategoryService
@Service public class CategoryServiceImpl extends Object implements CategoryService
This class provides the implementation of the CategoryService interface, offering methods to manage and retrieve category-related data from the database.

    • getCategoryPopularityOverview

      public List<Map<String,Object>> getCategoryPopularityOverview(Long categoryId)
      Retrieves an overview of the popularity of a given category, segmented by season. Note: This implementation returns dummy data.
      Specified by:
      getCategoryPopularityOverview in interface CategoryService
      Parameters:
      categoryId - The ID of the category for which the popularity overview is required.
      Returns:
      A list of maps, each representing the popularity score for the category in a specific season.
